content.en: Power system stability: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms, such as Support Vector Machines, Ball Vector Machines, and Pattern Classifier Algorithms, to address different challenges in power system stability. These algorithms are being investigated for tasks like categorizing power system stability, assessing transient stability, predicting post-fault transient stability status, and monitoring voltage stability. The goal is to leverage machine learning techniques to improve the efficiency and accuracy of power system operations and ensure reliable electricity supply.
content.da: Strømstabilitet: Forskerne har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom Support Vector Machines, Ball Vector Machines og mønsterklassifikationsalgoritmer, for at tackle forskellige udfordringer inden for strømstabilitet. Disse algoritmer bliver undersøgt til opgaver som kategorisering af strømstabilitet, vurdering af forbigående stabilitet, forudsigelse af forbigående stabilitetsstatus efter fejl og overvågning af spændingsstabilitet. Målet er at udnytte maskinlæringsteknikker til at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af strømforsyningsoperationer og sikre en pålidelig elektricitetstilførsel.
